trans-unit.source: Zuo Ci can't be blocked by creatures with horsemanship.

trans-unit.source: Whenever your opponent chooses a creature in play, he or she can't choose Zuo Ci.
trans-unit.target: 当你的对手需选择场上的生物时，他不能选择左慈。
